name: Aɴᴅᴇɴᴄᴇɴᴛᴏ UsᴇʀBᴏᴛ
description: Aɴᴅᴇɴᴄᴇɴᴛᴏ UsᴇʀBᴏᴛ is one of the Best UserBot for Telegram. Known for its Smoothness, Design, Support.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill Any name it is working as ALIVE_NAME. Default Value is None

SESSION.description: Get this value by using https://replit.com/@madboy482/Session-Andencento and fill this is your String Session.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the bot token here.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the username here.

SUDO_USERS.description: Userid of user to grant sudo access. Add multiple sudo users by giving a space between userids
